testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Successful Login with Valid Credentials # Features/Login.feature:3 Given User launch chrome browser # stepDefinitions.steps.user_launch_chrome_browser() When User opens Url "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login" # stepDefinitions.steps.user_opens_url(java.lang.String) And User enters Emails as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin" # stepDefinitions.steps.user_enters_emails_as_and_password_as(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And Click on login # stepDefinitions.steps.click_on_login() Then Page Title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration" # stepDefinitions.steps.page_title_should_be(java.lang.String) When User click on Logout link # stepDefinitions.steps.user_click_on_logout_link() Then Page Title should be "nopCommerce demo store. Login" # stepDefinitions.steps.page_title_should_be(java.lang.String) And close browser # stepDefinitions.steps.close_browser()

testcase.name: Login with Data Driven #1
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: Login with Data Driven # Features/Login.feature:25 Given User launch chrome browser # stepDefinitions.steps.user_launch_chrome_browser() When User opens Url "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login" # stepDefinitions.steps.user_opens_url(java.lang.String) And User enters Emails as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin" # stepDefinitions.steps.user_enters_emails_as_and_password_as(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And Click on login # stepDefinitions.steps.click_on_login() Then Page Title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration" # stepDefinitions.steps.page_title_should_be(java.lang.String) When User click on Logout link # stepDefinitions.steps.user_click_on_logout_link() Then Page Title after logout should be "nopCommerce demo store. Login" And close browser # stepDefinitions.steps.close_browser()

testcase.name: Search Customer by EmailId
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Search Customer by EmailId # Features/customers.feature:17 Given User launch chrome browser # stepDefinitions.steps.user_launch_chrome_browser() When User opens Url "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login" # stepDefinitions.steps.user_opens_url(java.lang.String) And User enters Emails as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin" # stepDefinitions.steps.user_enters_emails_as_and_password_as(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And Click on login # stepDefinitions.steps.click_on_login() Then User can view Dashboard # stepDefinitions.steps.user_can_view_dashboard() When User click on customers Menu # stepDefinitions.steps.user_click_on_customers_menu() And click on customers Menu Item # stepDefinitions.steps.click_on_customers_menu_item() And Enter customer Email # stepDefinitions.steps.enter_customer_email() When Click on search button # stepDefinitions.steps.click_on_search_button() victoria_victoria@nopCommerce.com Then User should found Email in the Search table # stepDefinitions.steps.user_should_found_email_in_the_searcg_table() And close browser # stepDefinitions.steps.close_browser()
